Public Class FormView Inherits CompositeDataBoundControl Implements IDataBoundItemControl, IDataItemContainer, IPostBackContainer, IPostBackEventHandler

public ref class FormView : System::Web::UI::WebControls::CompositeDataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IDataBoundItemControl, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IPostBackContainer

summary.span: 利用使用者定義的範本，顯示資料來源中單一記錄的值。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控制項可讓您編輯、刪除及插入記錄。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [範本Templates](#templates) - [繫結至資料Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [資料作業Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項用來顯示資料來源的單一記錄。The control is used to display a single record from a data source. 類似於控制項，只不過它會顯示使用者定義的範本，而不是資料列欄位。It is similar to the control, except it displays user-defined templates instead of row fields. 建立您自己的範本，讓您更大的彈性來控制資料的顯示方式。Creating your own templates gives you greater flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 控制項支援下列功能：The control supports the following features: - 繫結至資料來源控制項，例如和。Binding to data source controls, such as and . - 插入包含內建的功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 內建更新和刪除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 內建的分頁功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以程式設計方式存取物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性，處理事件，然後依此類推。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 透過使用者定義的範本、 主題和樣式的可自訂外觀。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates, themes, and styles. ## 範本Templates 針對控制項來顯示內容，您必須建立不同的組件控制項的範本。For the control to display content, you need to create templates for the different parts of the control. 大部分的範本是選擇性的。不過，您必須建立已在控制項模式的範本。Most templates are optional; however, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 比方說，支援將記錄插入的控制項都必須有已定義的插入項目範本。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an insert item template defined. 下表列出您可以建立不同的範本。The following table lists the different templates that you can create. |範本類型Template type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定義資料的內容資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 此範本通常會包含輸入的控制項和命令按鈕，使用者可以編輯現有的記錄。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can edit an existing record.| ||空白資料列會顯示當定義內容控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。Defines the content for the empty data row displayed when the control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records. 此範本通常會包含來提醒使用者資料來源不包含任何記錄的內容。This template usually contains content to alert the user that the data source does not contain any records.| ||定義頁尾資料列的內容。Defines the content for the footer row. 此範本通常會包含您想要顯示頁尾資料列中的任何其他內容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the footer row. **注意︰** 或者，您可以只指定要顯示頁尾資料列中，藉由設定文字屬性。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the footer row by setting the property.| ||定義標頭資料列的內容。Defines the content for the header row. 此範本通常會包含您想要顯示標頭資料列中的任何其他內容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the header row. **注意︰** 或者，您可以只指定要藉由設定標頭資料列中顯示的文字屬性。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the header row by setting the property.| ||定義資料的內容資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 此範本通常會包含用來顯示現有的資料錄的值。This template usually contains content to display the values of an existing record.| ||定義資料的內容資料列時控制項處於插入模式。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 此範本通常會包含輸入的控制項和命令按鈕，使用者可以加入新的記錄。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can add a new record.| ||定義啟用分頁功能時顯示的頁面巡覽列的內容 (當屬性設定為`true`)。Defines the content for the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`). 此範本通常會包含與使用者可以瀏覽至另一筆記錄的控制項。This template usually contains controls with which the user can navigate to another record. **注意︰** 控制項具有內建的頁面巡覽區資料列使用者介面 (UI)。**Note:** The control has a built-in pager row user interface (UI). 您要建立頁面巡覽區範本，只有當您想要建立您自己自訂的頁面巡覽列。You need to create a pager template only if you want to create your own custom pager row.| 若要顯示的項目範本欄位的值，使用資料繫結運算式。To display the value of a field in an item template, use a data binding expression. 如需有關資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 編輯項目範本和插入項目範本中的輸入的控制項可以使用雙向繫結運算式繫結至資料來源的欄位之用。Input controls in the edit item template and insert item template can be bound to the fields of a data source by using a two-way binding expression. 這可讓自動擷取更新的輸入控制項的值或插入作業的控制。This allows the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 雙向繫結運算式也會允許編輯項目範本以自動顯示原始的欄位值中的輸入的控制項。Two-way binding expressions also allow input controls in an edit item template to automatically display the original field values. 如需有關雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 繫結至資料Binding to Data 控制項可以繫結至資料來源控制項 (例如， ，或) 或會實作任何資料來源收集介面，例如， ， ，或其他集合型別。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as , , or ) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結控制項以適當的資料來源類型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將屬性若要控制資料來源控制項的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項，並可以利用資料來源控制項的功能，執行插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 這是要繫結至資料的慣用的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 繫結至資料來源會實作介面，以程式設計方式設定屬性控制項至資料來源，並接著呼叫方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 當使用這個方法，控制項不會提供內建的插入、 更新、 刪除和分頁功能。When using this method, the control does not provide built-in inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 您需要使用適當的事件提供這項功能。You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 如需有關資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). > [!NOTE] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 可能的話，強烈建議的值之前，進行 HTML 編碼它們會顯示在這個控制項。Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證控制項簡介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## 資料作業Data Operations 控制項提供許多內建功能，可讓使用者更新、 刪除、 插入和控制項中的項目頁面上。The control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 當控制項繫結至資料來源控制項，控制項可以利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新、 刪除、 插入和分頁功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控制項可以提供支援的 update、 delete、 insert 和分頁作業，與其他類型的資料來源; 不過，您必須提供適當的事件處理常式，這些作業的實作。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations. 因為控制項使用的範本，但是它不提供自動產生命令按鈕，來執行更新、 刪除或插入作業。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate command buttons to perform updating, deleting, or inserting operations. 您必須手動將這些命令按鈕，在適當的範本。You must manually include these command buttons in the appropriate template. 控制項能夠辨認某些按鈕具有其`CommandName`設為特定值的屬性。The control recognizes certain buttons that have their `CommandName` properties set to specific values. 下表列出的命令按鈕，控制項能夠辨認。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|「 取消 」"Cancel"|用於更新或插入作業以取消作業，並捨棄使用者所輸入的值。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 控制然後傳回所指定的模式屬性。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"|用於刪除作業，以刪除資料來源中顯示的資料錄。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"|在更新作業中用來放置控制項處於編輯模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 中指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"|用於插入作業，以嘗試使用使用者所提供的值的資料來源中插入新的記錄。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source using the values provided by the user. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |新增New|「 新 」"New"|在插入作業中用來放置控制項處於插入模式。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 中指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |頁面Page|「 頁面 」"Page"|用於分頁作業，以代表執行分頁的頁面巡覽列中的按鈕。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 指定的分頁作業，請設定`CommandArgument`"Next"、"Prev"、"First"、"Last"，或要瀏覽至頁面的索引按鈕的屬性。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 這種類型的按鈕通常只用於 [呼叫器] 範本。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"|用於更新作業，以嘗試使用使用者所提供的值更新資料來源中所顯示的資料錄。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 不同於 （這會立即刪除顯示的資料錄） 的 [刪除] 按鈕，按一下 [編輯] 或 [新增] 按鈕時，控制項編輯，或分別插入模式中，進入。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the displayed record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在編輯模式中，內容包含在屬性會顯示目前的資料項目。In edit mode, the content contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 一般而言，使 編輯 按鈕會取代的更新 和 取消 按鈕可以定義編輯項目範本。Typically, the edit item template is defined such that the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 輸入適用於欄位的資料類型的控制項 (例如或控制項) 通常也會顯示與使用者修改欄位的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are also usually displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 按一下 [更新] 按鈕更新資料來源中的記錄，而按一下 [取消] 按鈕，則會放棄任何變更。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同樣地，將包含的內容控制項處於插入模式時，將會顯示之資料項目的屬性。Likewise, the content contained in the property is displayed for the data item when the control is in insert mode. 新增 按鈕會取代插入 和 取消 按鈕，並讓使用者輸入新的資料錄的值會顯示空白的輸入的控制項，通常被定義插入項目範本。The insert item template is typically defined such that the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. 按一下 [插入] 按鈕在資料來源中，插入資料錄，而按一下 [取消] 按鈕，則會放棄任何變更。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 控制項提供分頁功能，可讓使用者瀏覽至其他資料來源中的記錄。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 啟用時，頁面巡覽列會顯示在包含頁面導覽控制項的控制項。When enabled, a pager row is displayed in the control that contains the page navigation controls. 若要啟用分頁，將屬性設`true`。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 您可以自訂的頁面巡覽列中包含的物件屬性來設定而屬性。You can customize the pager row by setting the properties of objects contained in the and the property. 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽列 UI，您可以建立自己的 UI 使用屬性。Instead of using the built-in pager row UI, you can create your own UI by using the property. ## 自訂使用者介面Customizing the User Interface 您可以自訂的外觀藉由設定不同的組件控制項的樣式屬性的控制項。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。The following table lists the different style properties. |樣式屬性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||資料的樣式設定資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in edit mode.| ||空白資料列中顯示的樣式設定控制當資料來源不包含任何記錄。The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||頁尾資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the footer row of the control.| ||標頭資料列的樣式設定控制項。The style settings for the header row of the control.| ||資料的樣式設定資料列時控制項處於插入模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in insert mode.| ||在顯示的頁面巡覽區資料列的樣式設定控制啟用分頁功能時。The style settings for the pager row displayed in the control when the paging feature is enabled.| ||資料的樣式設定資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。The style settings for the data row when the control is in read-only mode.| ## 事件Events 控制項提供數個事件，您可以進行程式設計。The control provides several events that you can program against. 這可讓您執行自訂的常式，每當事件發生時。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。Occurs when a button within a control is clicked. 若要在控制項中按一下按鈕時執行的工作通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||畢竟就會發生中建立物件控制項。Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 這個事件通常用於顯示之前修改記錄的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||當 [刪除] 按鈕時，就會發生 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 刪除 」) 按一下時，但之後控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕，但尚未控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||發生於 [插入] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Insert") 按一下時，但之後控制項插入資料錄。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 若要檢查插入作業的結果通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕，但尚未控制項插入資料錄。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||發生於 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 按一下時，但之後控制項更新資料列。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常會用來檢查更新作業的結果中。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||發生於按一下的 [更新] 按鈕，但尚未控制項更新資料錄。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常會用來取消更新作業中。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||之後，就會發生控制項變更模式 （若要編輯、 插入或唯讀模式）。Occurs after the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常會用來執行工作時控制項變更模式。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||之前發生控制項變更模式 （若要編輯、 插入或唯讀模式）。Occurs before the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 若要取消模式變更通常使用這個事件。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要在使用者瀏覽到控制項中不同的記錄後，執行工作時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用來取消分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles 控制項可讓您在標記中指定 CSS 樣式規則。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果您使用範本來自訂外觀控制項，您可以在範本標記中指定的 CSS 樣式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在此情況下，額外的外部資料表不是必要的。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以防止資料表，藉由設定轉譯屬性設`false`。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` from a control. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用分頁功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paging feature is enabled.

span.span: to enable the paging feature; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項有內建的分頁功能，可讓使用者瀏覽至 資料來源中的不同記錄。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 分頁功能可以搭配任何支援的資料來源物件介面或資料來源支援分頁功能。The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface or a data source that supports paging capability. 若要啟用分頁功能，將屬性設`true`。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 您可以使用，以判斷基礎資料來源中的項目總數屬性。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要判斷目前所顯示項目的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 啟用分頁時，額外的資料列呼叫的頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽列會包含頁面導覽控制項，並且可以顯示頂端、 底端，或同時頂端和底部的控制項。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 頁面巡覽列有四個內建的頁面巡覽，顯示模式。The pager row has four built-in pager display modes. 下表描述四種模式。The following table describes the four modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|一組分頁控制項，包含上一個 和 下一步 按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|一組分頁控制項，包含上一筆、 下一步，第一個和最後一個按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|一組分頁控制項，包含用於直接存取頁面的編號連結按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly. 此為預設模式。This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|一組分頁控制項，包含編號和第一個和最後一個連結按鈕。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| > [!NOTE] > 控制項自動隱藏的頁面巡覽列，當資料來源包含少於兩筆記錄。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 您可以使用來控制的設定 （例如頁面巡覽區顯示模式，在時間和頁面巡覽區控制項的文字標籤顯示的頁面連結數目） 的頁面巡覽列屬性。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制 （包括其背景色彩和字型色彩） 的頁面巡覽列的外觀，請使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color and font color), use the property. 控制項也可讓您定義的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 如需有關如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區資料列範本的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控制項提供數個事件，可用來執行自訂動作時進行分頁。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 當您需要在使用者瀏覽到控制項中不同的記錄後，執行工作時，通常使用這個事件。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 控制項處理分頁作業之前。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用來取消分頁作業。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| > [!NOTE] > 當您變更時，不會引發這些事件屬性以程式設計的方式。These events are not raised when you change the property programmatically. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，來啟用中的分頁功能控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging feature in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/CS/formviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/VB/formviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫的頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽列會包含控制項允許使用者瀏覽至其他記錄，它可以顯示頂端、 底端，或同時頂端和底部的控制項。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性，以程式設計方式存取物件，表示中的底端頁面巡覽列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是之後才可用控制項會建立中的底端頁面巡覽列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於需要以程式設計方式操作的底端頁面巡覽列，例如，當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 任何修改後，就必須執行屬性物件，表示底端頁面巡覽列已建立; 否則即為控制項會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the object that represents the bottom pager row has been created; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取顯示在底部的頁面巡覽列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the bottom of a control. 頁面巡覽區資料列則會更新與其他內容中。The pager row is then updated with additional content. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置控制項。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`TableCaptionAlign.Bottom`|標題項目與資料表底端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Left`|標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`|未設定標題項目對齊。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Right`|標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.| |`TableCaptionAlign.Top`|標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定為`TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`，會使用瀏覽器的預設值。When this property is set to `TableCaptionAlign.NotSet`, the default value of the browser is used. 額外的協助工具支援控制項由提供屬性。Additional accessibility support for the control is provided by the property. 使用屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字控制項。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的 HTML 標題項目中的控制項應該用來呈現控制項的左邊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the HTML caption element in a control should be rendered on the left side of the control. value.span: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會新增至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格控制項具有相同寬度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 以最寬的資料格套用的填補量和資料行中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的寬度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有儲存格有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 邊框距離會套用至資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要調整儲存格之間的間距，請使用屬性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 未設定這個屬性，可使用瀏覽器的預設值。When this property is not set, the default value of the browser is used. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距大小。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewCellPadding/CS/formviewcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewCellPadding/VB/formviewcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中相鄰儲存格之間的間距控制項。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the control. 此間距已套用垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 儲存格間距是統一整個控制項。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control. 不能指定資料列或資料行之間的個別儲存格間距。Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果您將此屬性設為大於 0，並接著設定屬性值，這個值會顯示儲存格框線，間隔會顯示相鄰的資料格框線之間。If you set this property to a value greater than 0, and then set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情況下，屬性控制的差距大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. 若要調整的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距，請使用屬性。To adjust the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的相鄰儲存格之間的間距大小。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between adjacent cells. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控制項處於插入模式，可讓使用者將新記錄加入到資料來源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormView.ReadOnly`|控制項處於唯讀模式，也就是一般顯示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 這個值通常自動設定控制時新增、 更新、 插入、 刪除或取消命令按鈕。This value is normally set automatically by the control when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 當控制項變更以回應動作的模式下, 表中的事件會引發。When the control changes modes in response to an action, the events in the following table are raised. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式，事件發生時執行適當的常式。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs the appropriate routine when the event occurs. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生時控制項變更模式，但在模式變更後。Occurs when the control changes modes, but after the mode changes. 此事件通常會用來執行工作時控制項變更模式。This event is commonly used to perform a task whenever the control changes modes.| ||發生時控制項變更模式，但在模式變更之前。Occurs when the control changes modes, but before the mode changes. 此事件常用來取消模式變更。This event is commonly used to cancel the mode change.| **附註**當您變更模式以程式設計方式使用時，不會引發這些事件方法。**Note** These events are not raised when you change the mode programmatically by using the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至另一個記錄的時間控制項是在 編輯多個，在分頁作業取消。If the user attempts to navigate to another record while the control is in edit more, the paging operation is canceled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否控制項返回編輯、 插入或唯讀模式更新後, 執行 [插入] 或取消作業。Use the property to specify whether the control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an update, insert, or cancel operation is performed. 根據預設，控制權回到唯讀模式; 不過，您可以保留控制中編輯，或插入模式，此屬性設定為適當的值。By default, the control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value. 下表列出不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控制項處於插入模式，可讓使用者將新記錄加入到資料來源。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|控制項處於唯讀模式，也就是一般顯示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 這個屬性通常是使用當控制項必須作為單一的目的，例如只插入或編輯記錄。This property is commonly used when the control has a single purpose, such as only to insert or edit records. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以保留處於編輯模式，在更新作業後的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. summary.span: 取得或設定處於編輯模式下項目的自訂內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for an item in edit mode.

value.span: 包含 控制項在編輯模式時的資料列自訂內容。

span.span: A that contains the custom content for the data row when the control is in edit mode.

value.span: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (藉由指定屬性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| 使用屬性來定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 編輯項目範本通常會包含要更新現有的記錄，以及更新記錄，以及取消更新作業的命令按鈕的值之使用者的輸入的控制項。The edit item template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record, as well as command buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 藉由使用雙向繫結運算式，您可以將欄位關聯的輸入控制項。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 這可讓控制項自動顯示相關聯的輸入控制項處於編輯模式中的 原始欄位值。This allows the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control in edit mode. 更新記錄時，控制項自動從相關聯的輸入控制項擷取更新的欄位值。When a record is updated, the control automatically extracts the updated field value from the associated input control. 如需有關雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要建立的內建的取消和更新作業所執行的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項新增至範本，內含其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按鈕類型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|「 取消 」"Cancel"| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在編輯模式中定義資料列的自訂範本。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewEditItemTemplate/CS/formviewedititemtemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewEditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewEditItemTemplate/VB/formviewedititemtemplatevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料的外觀資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in edit mode. 當控制項處於編輯模式時，資料列會顯示所指定的使用者定義內容屬性。When the control is in edit mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 這個屬性是唯讀的;不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性物件傳回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用其中一種下列方法以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中，表單中的控制項`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常會包括自訂的背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂樣式的資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in edit mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部控制何時或屬性設定。The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the control when the or property is set. 使用屬性，以程式設計方式存取物件，表示頁尾資料列。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the footer row. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是之後才可用控制項會建立中的頁尾資料列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the footer row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如，當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content. 任何修改後，就必須執行屬性控制項已轉譯，否則控制項會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. 若要控制的頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用屬性。To control the style of the footer row, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式修改期間的頁尾資料列的屬性事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the properties of the footer row during the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (藉由指定屬性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| 使用屬性來定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時控制項處於插入模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 插入項目範本通常會包含新的記錄中，輸入的值，以及命令按鈕插入一筆記錄，以及取消插入作業的使用者輸入的控制項。The insert item template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for the new record, as well as command buttons to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 藉由使用雙向繫結運算式，您可以將欄位關聯的輸入控制項。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 插入一筆記錄時，控制項自動從相關聯的輸入控制項擷取欄位值。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. 如需有關雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要建立執行內建的取消和插入作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項新增至範本，內含其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按鈕類型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|「 取消 」"Cancel"| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在插入模式中定義資料列的自訂範本。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in insert mode. summary.span: 按一下 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。

span.span: Occurs when a button within a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內的按鈕時，會引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 按鈕內控制項也可以叫用某些控制項的內建的功能。Buttons within a control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control. 若要執行這些作業的其中一個，設定`CommandName`下表中的值的其中一個按鈕的屬性。To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |「 取消 」"Cancel"|取消編輯或插入作業，並傳回所指定的模式來控制屬性。Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |"Delete""Delete"|刪除目前的記錄。Deletes the current record. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |[編輯]"Edit"|將控制項處於編輯模式。Puts the control in edit mode. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 插入 」"Insert"|將目前的資料錄插入資料來源。Inserts the current record in the data source. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 新 」"New"|將控制項處於插入模式。Puts the control in insert mode. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 頁面 」"Page"|執行在分頁作業。Performs a paging operation. 設定`CommandArgument`"First"，"Last"按鈕、"Next"、"Prev"或執行頁碼，以指定的分頁作業類型的屬性。Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |「 更新 」"Update"|更新資料來源中目前的資料錄。Updates the current record in the data source. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 雖然按一下上表中列出的按鈕時，會引發事件，則建議您使用作業的資料表中列出的事件。Although the event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷所按的按鈕命令引數的命令名稱。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked. 若要判斷命令名稱和命令引數，請使用和屬性，分別。To determine the command name and command argument, use the and properties, respectively. 您也可以存取使用引發事件的控制項屬性。You can also access the control that raised the event by using the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件以處理按鈕按一下控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to handle a button click in a control. 當使用者按一下 [新增] 按鈕時，要將目前所顯示的項目加入至控制項。When the user clicks the Add button, the currently displayed item is added to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/CS/formviewcommandeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/VB/formviewcommandeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生在 控制項中建立所有資料列之後。

span.span: Occurs after all the rows are created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中建立的所有資料列之後，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised after all rows are created in a control. 當第一次呈現控制項，或當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄時，也可能會發生。This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record. 您可以使用這個事件提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如加入或修改資料列的內容時就會發生此事件。You can use this event to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding to or modifying the contents of a row, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 事件發生之前控制項所繫結至資料。The event occurs before the control is bound to data. 若要修改繫結欄位的值，請使用事件。To modify the value of a bound field, use the event. 您可以存取標頭、 頁尾和頁面巡覽區中的資料列使用的控制項， ， ，或屬性，分別。You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the control by using the , , , or properties, respectively. 若要存取的資料列，請使用屬性。To access the data row, use the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以更新的文字的頁面巡覽列中包含的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to update the text of a control contained in the pager row. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCreated/CS/formviewitemcreatedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCreated/VB/formviewitemcreatedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [刪除] 按鈕時，但是在刪除作業之後。

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but after the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [刪除] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 刪除 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項刪除資料錄。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查刪除作業的結果時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷的刪除作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您也可以指定是否處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您想要存取的索引鍵欄位和已刪除的資料錄的非索引鍵欄位名稱/值組，使用和屬性，分別。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否刪除作業期間發生的例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/CS/formviewdeletedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeletedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeletedEventArgs/VB/formviewdeletedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [刪除] 按鈕時，但是在刪除作業之前。

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but before the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [刪除] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 刪除 」) 控制項內按一下時，但尚未控制項刪除資料錄。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如記錄刪除之前先驗證它，每次這個事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您決定要刪除資料錄的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要判斷資料錄的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of a record, use the property. 若要取消刪除作業，請設定屬性設`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以存取的索引鍵欄位和非索引鍵欄位，使用和屬性，分別。You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the and properties, respectively. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消刪除作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewDeleteEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventArgs/CS/formviewdeleteeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewDeleteEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewDeleteEventArgs/VB/formviewdeleteeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [插入] 按鈕時，但是在插入作業之後。

span.span: Occurs when an Insert button within a control is clicked, but after the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [插入] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Insert") 在控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項插入資料錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查插入作業的結果時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷受到 insert 作業的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您也可以指定是否處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您需要存取已插入的資料錄的值，使用屬性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 根據預設，控制權回到指定的模式之後插入作業的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 若要保持控制項處於插入模式，並設定屬性設`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否在插入作業期間發生的例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [插入] 按鈕，但是在插入作業之前。

span.span: Occurs when an Insert button within a control is clicked, but before the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [插入] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Insert") 在控制項內按一下時，之前控制項插入資料錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，以執行自訂的常式，例如 HTML 編碼之前插入資料來源，在每次這個事件發生時的記錄的值。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷值的選擇性命令引數傳送至控制項並指出應該取消插入作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 命令引數的值會對應到`CommandArgument`[插入] 按鈕的屬性。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button. 當`CommandArgument`的 [插入] 按鈕的屬性設定，請使用屬性來判斷命令引數的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消插入作業，請設定屬性設`true`。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以讀取或修改新的資料錄的欄位值使用屬性。You can also read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消插入作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/CS/formviewinserteventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertEventArgs/VB/formviewinserteventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定當 控制項處於唯讀模式時，控制項中資料列的自訂內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the data row in a control when the control is in read-only mode.

value.span: 包含 控制項在唯讀模式時的資料列自訂內容。

span.span: A that contains the custom content for the data row when the control is in read-only mode.

value.span: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (藉由指定屬性)。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|呈現的範本Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |EditEdit|| |InsertInsert|| |唯讀Read-only|| 使用屬性來定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 項目範本通常會包含顯示欄位值的一筆記錄，以及命令按鈕來編輯、 插入和刪除記錄的控制項。The item template usually contains controls to display the field values of a record, as well as command buttons to edit, insert, and delete a record. 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要顯示的欄位值繫結至控制項的資料來源，使用資料繫結運算式。To display the field values of the data source bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 如需有關資料繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 若要建立執行內建的刪除、 編輯和新的記錄作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項新增至範本，內含其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。To create command buttons that perform the built-in delete, edit, and new record operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按鈕類型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"| |新增New|「 新 」"New"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀屬性。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在唯讀模式下定義的資料列的自訂範本。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in read-only mode. summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [更新] 按鈕時，但在更新作業之後。

span.span: Occurs when an Update button within a control is clicked, but after the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 在控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項更新資料錄。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷更新作業所影響的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您也可以指定是否處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您需要存取已更新資料錄的索引鍵欄位值，使用屬性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 使用可以存取的原始和更新的非索引鍵欄位值和屬性，分別。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 根據預設，控制權回到指定的模式在更新作業後的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要保持控制項處於編輯模式，並設定屬性設`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷更新作業期間是否發生例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於按一下 控制項內的 [更新] 按鈕時，但在更新作業之前。

span.span: Occurs when an Update button within a control is clicked, but before the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，之前控制項更新資料錄。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如 HTML 編碼的資料錄的值更新資料來源，在每次這個事件發生時之前的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷值的選擇性命令引數傳送至控制項並指出應該取消更新作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled. 命令引數的值會對應到`CommandArgument`屬性的 [更新] 按鈕。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button. 當`CommandArgument`的 [更新] 按鈕的屬性設定，請使用屬性來判斷命令引數的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消更新作業，請設定屬性設`true`。To cancel the update operation, set the property to `true`. 您也可以讀取或修改使用使用者所輸入的新值和屬性。You can also read or modify the new values entered by the user by using the and properties. 屬性包含的索引鍵的欄位，而屬性包含非索引鍵欄位。The property contains the key fields, while the property contains the non-key fields. 如果您需要存取原始非索引鍵欄位值，使用屬性。If you need to access the original non-key field values, use the property. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消更新作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdateEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdateEventArgs/CS/formviewupdateeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdateEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdateEventArgs/VB/formviewupdateeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 發生於 控制項在編輯、插入和唯讀模式之間切換時，但在模式變更後。

span.span: Occurs when the control switches between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項嘗試切換編輯、 插入和唯讀模式之間，但在模式會實際變更之後。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode actually changes. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如同步處理的事件處理方法與這個事件發生時的另一個控制項的控制項。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the control with another control, whenever this event occurs. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件的標頭資料列中顯示目前的模式控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to display the current mode in the header row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeChanged/CS/formviewmodechangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewModeChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeChanged/VB/formviewmodechangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 控制項在編輯、插入和唯讀模式之間切換，但在模式尚未變更之前發生。

span.span: Occurs when the control switches between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時控制項嘗試切換編輯、 插入和唯讀模式之間，但在模式會實際變更之前。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，以執行自訂的常式，例如設定控制特定的模式，或取消模式變更時就會發生此事件。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷要模式切換控制項，以判斷是否已引發事件，因為使用者取消編輯作業，或表示應該取消插入作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the control is switching, to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled. 若要判斷新的模式，請使用屬性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 您也可以使用切換至替代的模式設定為其中一個屬性列舉值。You can also use the property to switch to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the enumeration values. 使用屬性來判斷使用者是否取消編輯作業。Use the property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation. 若要取消插入作業，請設定屬性設`true`。To cancel an insert operation, set the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以隱藏頁面巡覽區資料列時控制轉換至編輯模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to hide the pager row when the control transitions to edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewModeEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeEventArgs/CS/formviewmodeeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewModeEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewModeEventArgs/VB/formviewmodeeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: to indicate the event should be passed further up the control hierarchy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可由控制項來選擇性地處理透過控制階層中向上傳遞的事件方法。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events passed up through the control hierarchy by the method. 它決定是否要檢查的屬性來處理事件中所包含的物件`e`參數。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object contained in the `e` parameter. 當事件需要處理時，方法會執行適當的動作。When an event needs to be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 忽略其他事件，並且控制階層架構中向上傳遞。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 這個方法會指出是否要將事件傳遞進一步透過它的傳回值的控制項階層架構。This method indicates whether to pass the event further up the control hierarchy through its return value. 控制項會覆寫這個方法，以在按一下其中一個按鈕控制項辨識時，執行適當的動作的基底實作。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出的命令按鈕，控制項能夠辨認。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|「 取消 」"Cancel"|用於更新或插入作業以取消作業，並捨棄使用者所輸入的值。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 控制然後傳回所指定的模式屬性。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |刪除Delete|"Delete""Delete"|用於刪除作業，以刪除資料來源中顯示的資料錄。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|[編輯]"Edit"|在更新作業中用來放置控制項處於編輯模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 中指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |InsertInsert|「 插入 」"Insert"|用於插入作業，以嘗試在資料來源中插入新的記錄，使用者所提供的值。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| |新增New|「 新 」"New"|在插入作業中用來放置控制項處於插入模式。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 中指定的內容屬性會顯示為資料列。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |頁面Page|「 頁面 」"Page"|用於分頁作業，以代表執行分頁的頁面巡覽列中的按鈕。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 指定的分頁作業，請設定`CommandArgument`"Next"、"Prev"、"First"、"Last"，或要瀏覽至頁面的索引按鈕的屬性。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 這種類型的按鈕通常只用於 [呼叫器] 範本。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|「 更新 」"Update"|用於更新作業，以嘗試使用使用者所提供的值更新資料來源中所顯示的資料錄。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 會引發和事件。Raises the and events.| 這個版本的方法會傳回`true`當其中一個按鈕處理。This version of the method returns `true` when one of these buttons is handled. 如需有關事件反昇的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫控制項來引發事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用類別。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得要顯示資料來源中所有資料錄的所需頁面總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.

value.span: 基礎資料來源中的項目數目。

span.span: The number of items in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，使用屬性，以判斷基礎資料來源中的記錄總數。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source. > [!NOTE] > 因為控制項一次顯示只有一筆記錄，這個值會對應到資料來源中顯示每一筆記錄所需的頁面總數。Because the control displays only one record at a time, this value corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source. 此值才會準確之後就會發生資料繫結。This value is not accurate until after data-binding occurs. 若要判斷目前的記錄從基礎資料來源的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷控制項中顯示的記錄總數。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the total number of records displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/CS/formviewpagertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/VB/formviewpagertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示頁面的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the displayed page.

value.span: 以零起始的資料項目索引，此資料項目來自基礎資料來源，目前顯示在 控制項中。

span.span: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a control from the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，使用屬性來判斷目前顯示的資料錄的索引。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the index of the currently displayed record. 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式變更顯示的資料錄。You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record. > [!NOTE] > 啟用分頁功能時，您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷顯示; 記錄的頁面數目不過，請注意，此屬性是以零為起始。When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based. 若要判斷資料來源中的項目總數，請使用屬性。To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷顯示的資料錄的頁面索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the page index of the displayed record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/CS/formviewpagertemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPagerTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPagerTemplate/VB/formviewpagertemplatevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The selected value is less than -1.

member this.PageIndexChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性值在分頁作業之後變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes after a paging operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項處理分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常會用來同步處理用來控制控制或設定的行為在分頁作業之後的控制項。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件，以傳回為唯讀模式，當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageIndexChanged/CS/formviewpageindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageIndexChanged/VB/formviewpageindexchangedvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件的頁面巡覽區按鈕時 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 在控制項內按一下時，之前控制項處理分頁作業。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業，每次這個事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 當您以程式設計方式設定時，不會引發這個事件屬性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽列控制項。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出應該取消分頁作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，請使用屬性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消分頁作業，請設定的屬性物件到`true`。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用取消分頁作業的事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a paging operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的設定中的頁面巡覽列控制項。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 啟用分頁功能時，會顯示頁面巡覽列 (當屬性設定為`true`)，並包含可讓使用者瀏覽至不同的記錄，在控制項中的控制項。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的;不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性物件傳回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 屬性可以宣告方式設定形式`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`PagerSettings-Mode`)。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`). 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`PagerSettings.Mode`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSettings.Mode`). 常見的設定通常會包含頁面巡覽列的顯示模式及自訂文字或影像的導覽控制項。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽列的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中的頁面巡覽區資料列的外觀控制項。Use the property to control the appearance of the pager row in a control. 啟用分頁功能時，會顯示頁面巡覽列 (當屬性設定為`true`)，並包含可讓使用者瀏覽至不同的頁面控制項中的控制項。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 這個屬性是唯讀的;不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性物件傳回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用其中一種下列方法以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中，表單中的控制項`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`PagerStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`PagerStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常會包括自訂的背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的頁面巡覽列的樣式設定。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the style settings for the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面巡覽列會顯示在控制啟用分頁功能時 (當屬性設定為 true)。A pager row is displayed in a control when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to true). 頁面巡覽列會包含可讓使用者瀏覽至不同的頁面控制項中的控制項。The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 而不是使用內建的頁面巡覽區資料列使用者介面 (UI)，您可以定義自己的 UI 使用屬性。Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 當屬性設定會覆寫內建的頁面巡覽列 UI。When the property is set it overrides the built-in pager row UI. 若要指定的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本，請先將放``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容``標記。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要控制的頁面巡覽列的外觀，請使用屬性。To control the appearance of the pager row, use the property. 一般而言，按鈕控制項加入頁面巡覽區範本來執行分頁作業。Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations. 控制項執行分頁作業時使用的按鈕控制項其`CommandName`按一下屬性設定為 「 頁面 」。The control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked. 按鈕的`CommandArgument`屬性會判斷要執行的分頁作業類型。The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform. 下表列出支援的命令引數值控制項。The following table lists the command argument values supported by the control. |CommandArgument 值CommandArgument value|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |「 下一步"Next"|巡覽至下一個頁面。Navigates to the next page.| |"Prev""Prev"|巡覽至上一頁。Navigates to the previous page.| |"First""First"|瀏覽至第一頁。Navigates to the first page.| |「 最後 」"Last"|巡覽至最後一個頁面。Navigates to the last page.| |整數值Integer value|瀏覽至指定的頁碼。Navigates to the specified page number.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義自訂的頁面巡覽區的範本。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom pager template. remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓內嵌樣式屬性，例如套用至所有呈現給控制項的 HTML、 ASP.NET 含括在轉譯的 HTML`table`項目。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果您不想外部`table`要呈現的項目會將此屬性設定為`false`。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在此情況下，如果您嘗試設定內嵌樣式屬性套用至整個控制項時，就會擲回例外狀況。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料的外觀資料列時控制項處於唯讀狀態 （顯示器） 模式。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in read-only (display) mode. 當控制項處於唯讀模式時，資料列會顯示所指定的使用者定義內容屬性。When the control is in read-only mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 這個屬性是唯讀的;不過，您可以在這裡設定的屬性物件傳回。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用其中一種下列方法以宣告方式設定屬性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 將屬性放在開頭標記中，表單中的控制項`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性物件 (例如`RowStyle-ForeColor`)。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`). - 巢狀``的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目控制項。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單`Property.Subproperty`(例如`RowStyle.ForeColor`)。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`). 常見的設定通常會包括自訂的背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定自訂樣式的資料列時控制項處於唯讀模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in read-only mode. value.span: ，表示 控制項上方的頁面巡覽列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用分頁時 (當屬性設定為`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫的頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在控制項。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 頁面巡覽列會包含控制項允許使用者瀏覽至其他記錄，它可以顯示頂端、 底端，或同時頂端和底部的控制項。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用屬性，以程式設計方式存取物件，表示中的頂端頁面巡覽列控制項。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是之後才可用控制項會建立中的頂端頁面巡覽列事件。The property is available only after the control creates the top pager row in the event. 這個屬性通常用於需要以程式設計方式操作的頂端頁面巡覽列，例如，當加入自訂內容。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 任何修改後，就必須執行屬性控制項已繫結至資料，否則控制項會覆寫任何變更。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been bound to data; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取的頂端顯示的頁面巡覽列控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the top of a control. 頁面巡覽區資料列則會更新與其他內容中。The pager row is then updated with additional content. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewTopPagerRow/CS/formviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewTopPagerRow/VB/formviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項處於編輯模式，請使用方法來以程式設計方式更新資料來源中目前的記錄。When the control is in edit mode, use the method to programmatically update the current record in the data source. 當您需要更新之外，將從目前之記錄時，通常使用這個方法控制項，例如從不同頁面上的控制項。This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 被呼叫，否則這個方法時，控制項必須是處於編輯模式就會擲回。The control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an is thrown. 若要指定更新作業之前是否執行頁面驗證，請使用`causesValidation`參數。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 呼叫這個方法也會引發和事件。Calling this method also raises the and events. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來以程式設計方式更新中的目前記錄資料來源中的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically update the current record in a control in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdateItem/CS/formviewupdateitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdateItem/VB/formviewupdateitemvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用具有 Web Form 模型繫結的教學課程系列，請參閱 < [ 模型繫結和 Web Form](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
